venue.address_1: Harrison Avenue & Essex Street, Boston, MA
venue.name: Chinatown Phillips Square

item.description:
Chinese New Year Parade 
Location: Chinatown - Phillips Square 
Date: Jan 29, 2012 Sunday 
Time: 10pm-5pm
Cost: FREE

  • Parading all through Chinatown all day
  • Follow one of the many clubs around as they parade from business to business
  • Come eat, stay, play!

If you can show up at any time during this Sunday all-day event, mark yourself as a "YES" and bring friends to speak Mandarin in Boston's Chinatown.

group.name: The Boston Mandarin Chinese Language Meetup Group

item.name: Chinese New Year Parade
